arrayGenerator

Class SimpleRandomListingGeneratorTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • arrayGenerator.SortedListingGenerator
      • arrayGenerator.RandomListingGenerator
        • arrayGenerator.SimpleRandomListingGenerator
          • arrayGenerator.SimpleRandomListingGeneratorTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Timer

    public class SimpleRandomListingGeneratorTimer
extends SimpleRandomListingGenerator
implements Timer
    A timer implementation for simple random listing generators that times the randomise method.
    Version:
    September 2018
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne
